full_text: Baskets are worked top down. Uses a 29” circular needle. Suggests using dpns when it gets too small for the circular needle. Directions are for size Small basket. Changes for Medium and Large baskets are in parentheses. Small basket measures about 7½” 19 cm tall and 30” 76 cm circumference. Medium basket measures about 10½” 26.5 cm tall and 36” 91.5 cm circumference. Large basket measures about 14” 35.5 cm tall and 42” 106.5 cm circumference. RED HEART® Super Saver®: 1 skein each of the following for indicated sizes: Small: 368 Paddy Green A, 672 Spring Green B, 668 Honeydew C Medium: 376 Burgundy A, 3901 Rouge B, 718 Shocking Pink C. Large: 5851 Denim A, 3945 Blue Suede B, 347 Light Periwinkle C All Sizes: 341 Light Grey D, 400 Grey Heather E, 3950 Charcoal F, and 312 Black G Organize your clutter with knit baskets that are super cool for living areas or kids’ rooms! We’ve shown three sizes in three color combinations, but you can use any hues that are right for you. Crochet version
name: Ravelry: Ombré Knit Baskets pattern by Heather Lodinsky
